main.name: Christopher Carson
main.description: Passionate about clean code • Actively looking for Junior level remote developement work
main.bio: My homebase is in the foothills of beautiful Northern CA. I love working remotely and being challenged by code. Please reach out to me with any employment oppurtunities.

resume.skillmessage: Git, React.js, Redux, Jest, Enzyme, JavaScript (ES6), Babel, Typescript, Leaflet, Cesium, OpenCV, GraphQL PostgreSQL, MySQL, Linux, Java and Python. Experienced with the agile development process and being part of a fully distributed team.

education.description: 3.9 GPA - Received award for Most Innovative Capstone of graduating class

work.title: Remote Front-End Developer
work.description: Working as a 1099 part-time contracter developing in Javascript, C# and ASP.NET

work.title: Remote Full Stack Developer
work.description: Worked as a full stack developer on a four-person distributed team creating a highly optimized React app for the Department of Defense. Project utilized Node.js, Babel, TypeScript, GraphQL, React.js, Redux, Jest, Cesium and Leaflet libraries.

work.title: Director of IT / Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developed custom Customer Relation Management software, custom timekeeping solution, internal Sales dashboard utilizing Google Apps Scripts, PHP, JQuery, AJAX and Bootstrap. Hosted Windows 2016 server on AWS (EC2) and managed MySQL database.

projects.title: Computer Juggling Coach
projects.category: A project using OpenCV and TensorFlow to detect juggling patterns in your browser. Check it out!

projects.title: Profile Website
projects.category: This profile site was built with Functional React.js, ES6 and Babel. Check out the code on my GitHub!

projects.title: StarMax - Storefront with Admin dashboard
projects.category: A demo storefront built with PHP, JQuery, Ajax and Bootstrap. Click to view the live site!

projects.title: Peril - Multiplayer Trivia Game
projects.category: A collobrorative projoct for a multi-player trivia game using Ruby on Rails and Action Rail. Check out the code on Github!

projects.title: Sales Dashboard
projects.category: A sales tracking and reporting tool created with Google Apps Script currently in use by my previous employer. Check out the code on Google.

testimonials.text: Chris was a great team member during his time at Moebius. He made significant contributions to our software. Unfortunately economic constraints required Moebius to restructure and lose valued employees such as Chris. I can confidently recommend Chris as a Software Engineer to any prospective employer.
testimonials.user: Douglas MacDougal, M.Sc. - Principle Engineer, Moebius Solutions, Inc.

testimonials.text: Chris Carson was an invaluable member of our team. It was sad to see him go. We still reach out to him today for consultation on our technology needs.
testimonials.user: Christopher Martini – V.P. of Marketing, Central Sanitary Supply
